task.title: Task
task.closeAndStart: Close task and start a new one
task.delete: Delete Task (Shift + Click to skip confirmation)

about:
Work with AI assistance.
Check out our documentation to learn more.
onboarding: Your task list in this workspace is empty.

boomerangTasks.title: Boomerang Tasks
boomerangTasks.description: Split tasks into smaller, manageable parts

stickyModels.title: Sticky Models
stickyModels.description: Each mode remembers your last used model

tools.title: Tools
tools.description: Allow the AI to solve problems by browsing the web, running commands, and more

customizableModes.title: Customizable Modes
customizableModes.description: Specialized personas with their own behaviors and assigned models

enhancePromptDescription: The 'Enhance Prompt' button helps improve your prompt by providing additional context, clarification, or rephrasing. Try typing a prompt in here and clicking the button again to see how it works.
addContext: @ to add context, / to switch modes
dragFiles: hold shift to drag in files
dragFilesImages: hold shift to drag in files/images

checkpoint.initializingWarning: Still initializing checkpoint... If this takes too long, you can disable checkpoints in <settingsLink>settings</settingsLink> and restart your task.

menu.restoreFilesDescription: Restores your project's files back to a snapshot taken at this point.
menu.restoreFilesAndTaskDescription: Restores your project's files back to a snapshot taken at this point and deletes all messages after this point.

instructions.wantsToFetch: NeonTractor wants to fetch detailed instructions to assist with the current task

fileOperations.wantsToRead: NeonTractor wants to read this file:
fileOperations.wantsToReadMultiple: NeonTractor wants to read multiple files:
fileOperations.wantsToReadAndXMore: NeonTractor wants to read this file and {{count}} more:
fileOperations.wantsToReadOutsideWorkspace: NeonTractor wants to read this file outside of the workspace:
fileOperations.wantsToEdit: NeonTractor wants to edit this file:
fileOperations.wantsToEditOutsideWorkspace: NeonTractor wants to edit this file outside of the workspace:
fileOperations.wantsToApplyBatchChanges: NeonTractor wants to apply changes to multiple files:
fileOperations.wantsToCreate: NeonTractor wants to create a new file:
fileOperations.wantsToSearchReplace: NeonTractor wants to search and replace in this file:
fileOperations.didSearchReplace: NeonTractor performed search and replace on this file:
fileOperations.wantsToInsert: NeonTractor wants to insert content into this file:
fileOperations.wantsToInsertWithLineNumber: NeonTractor wants to insert content into this file at line {{lineNumber}}:
fileOperations.wantsToInsertAtEnd: NeonTractor wants to append content to the end of this file:

directoryOperations.wantsToViewTopLevel: NeonTractor wants to view the top level files in this directory:
directoryOperations.didViewTopLevel: NeonTractor viewed the top level files in this directory:
directoryOperations.wantsToViewRecursive: NeonTractor wants to recursively view all files in this directory:
directoryOperations.didViewRecursive: NeonTractor recursively viewed all files in this directory:
directoryOperations.wantsToViewDefinitions: NeonTractor wants to view source code definition names used in this directory:
directoryOperations.didViewDefinitions: NeonTractor viewed source code definition names used in this directory:
directoryOperations.wantsToSearch: NeonTractor wants to search this directory for {{regex}}:

codebaseSearch.wantsToSearch: NeonTractor wants to search the codebase for {{query}}:
codebaseSearch.wantsToSearchWithPath: NeonTractor wants to search the codebase for {{query}} in {{path}}:

mcp.wantsToUseTool: NeonTractor wants to use a tool on the {{serverName}} MCP server:
mcp.wantsToAccessResource: NeonTractor wants to access a resource on the {{serverName}} MCP server:

modes.wantsToSwitch: NeonTractor wants to switch to {{mode}} mode
modes.wantsToSwitchWithReason: NeonTractor wants to switch to {{mode}} mode because: {{reason}}

subtasks.wantsToCreate: NeonTractor wants to create a new subtask in {{mode}} mode:
subtasks.wantsToFinish: NeonTractor wants to finish this subtask
subtasks.defaultResult: Please continue to the next task.
subtasks.completionInstructions: Subtask completed! You can review the results and suggest any corrections or next steps. If everything looks good, confirm to return the result to the parent task.

powershell.issues: It seems like you're having Windows PowerShell issues, please see this

autoApprove.title: Auto-approve:
autoApprove.description: Auto-approve allows NeonTractor to perform actions without asking for permission. Only enable for actions you fully trust. More detailed configuration available in <settingsLink>Settings</settingsLink>.

announcement.title: ðŸŽ‰ NeonTractor {{version}} Released
announcement.description: NeonTractor {{version}} brings major new features and improvements based on your feedback.
announcement.feature1: <bold>Experimental Marketplace</bold>: Discover and install modes and MCPs from the new marketplace (enable in <experimentalSettingsLink>Experimental Settings</experimentalSettingsLink>)
announcement.feature2: <bold>Enhanced File Operations</bold>: Multiple concurrent file writes in experimental settings, and concurrent reads now in <contextSettingsLink>Context Settings</contextSettingsLink>
announcement.feature3: <bold>MCP Improvements & More</bold>: Enhanced MCP support, Mermaid controls, Amazon Bedrock thinking support, and much more!
announcement.detailsDiscussLinks: Get more details and discuss in <discordLink>Discord</discordLink> and <redditLink>Reddit</redditLink> ðŸš€

followUpSuggest.copyToInput: Copy to input (same as shift + click)

browser.rooWantsToUse: NeonTractor wants to use the browser:

systemPromptWarning: WARNING: Custom system prompt override active. This can severely break functionality and cause unpredictable behavior.
profileViolationWarning: The current profile violates your organization's settings

shellIntegration.title: Command Execution Warning
shellIntegration.description: Your command is being executed without VSCode terminal shell integration. To suppress this warning you can disable shell integration in the Terminal section of the NeonTractor settings or troubleshoot VSCode terminal integration using the link below.
shellIntegration.troubleshooting: Click here for shell integration documentation.

autoApprovedRequestLimitReached.title: Auto-Approved Request Limit Reached
autoApprovedRequestLimitReached.description: NeonTractor has reached the auto-approved limit of {{count}} API request(s). Would you like to reset the count and proceed with the task?
